00088 /* Figure out how to support 64-bit datatypes */
00089 #if !defined(__STRICT_ANSI__)
00090 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00091 #define FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE   long long
00092 #endif
00093 #if defined(__CC_ARM)
00094 #define FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE   long long
00095 #endif
00096 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00097 #define FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE __int64
00098 #endif
00099 #endif /* !__STRICT_ANSI__ */
00100 
00101 /* The 64-bit datatype isn't supported on all platforms */
00102 #ifdef FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE
00103 
00110 typedef unsigned FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE Uint64;
00117 typedef signed FETION_HAS_64BIT_TYPE Sint64;
00118 #else
00119 /* This is really just a hack to prevent the compiler from complaining */
00120 typedef struct {
00121         Uint32 hi;
00122         Uint32 lo;
00123 } Uint64, Sint64;
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 /* Make sure the types really have the right sizes */
00127 #define FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(name, x)               \
00128         typedef int FETION_dummy_ ## name[(x) * 2 - 1]
00129 
00130 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(uint8, sizeof(Uint8) == 1);
00131 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(sint8, sizeof(Sint8) == 1);
00132 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(uint16, sizeof(Uint16) == 2);
00133 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(sint16, sizeof(Sint16) == 2);
00134 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(uint32, sizeof(Uint32) == 4);
00135 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(sint32, sizeof(Sint32) == 4);
00136 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(uint64, sizeof(Uint64) == 8);
00137 FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT(sint64, sizeof(Sint64) == 8);
00138 
00139 #undef FETION_COMPILE_TIME_ASSERT

00159 /* Pardon the mess, I'm trying to determine the endianness of this host.
00160 *    I'm doing it by preprocessor defines rather than some sort of configure
00161 *    script so that application code can use this too.  The "right" way would
00162 *    be to dynamically generate this file on install, but that's a lot of work.
00163 */
00164 
00182 #if  defined(__i386__) || defined(__ia64__) || \
00183         (defined(__alpha__) || defined(__alpha)) || \
00184         defined(__arm__) || \
00185         (defined(__CC_ARM) && !defined(__BIG_ENDIAN)) || \
00186         (defined(__mips__) && defined(__MIPSEL__)) || \
00187         defined(__LITTLE_ENDIAN__) || \
00188         defined(WIN32)
00189 #define FETION_BYTEORDER   FETION_LIL_ENDIAN
00190 #else
00191 #define FETION_BYTEORDER   FETION_BIG_ENDIAN
00192 #endif

00431 #ifndef MAX
00432 #define MAX(x, y)           (((x) > (y))?(x):(y))
00433 #endif
00434 
00438 #ifndef MIN
00439 #define MIN(x, y)           (((x) < (y))?(x):(y))
00440 #endif

00447 #endif
00448 
00453 #ifndef CLAMP
00454 #define CLAMP(x, low, high)  (((x) > (high)) ? (high) : (((x) < (low)) ? (low) : (x)))
00455 #endif

00461 #define ISSPACE(c)              ((c) == ' ' || (c) == '\f' || (c) == '\n' || \
00462         (c) == '\r' || (c) == '\t' || (c) == '\v')

00468 #define ISUPPER(c)              ((c) >= 'A' && (c) <= 'Z')
00469 
00474 #define ISLOWER(c)              ((c) >= 'a' && (c) <= 'z')
00475 
00480 #define ISALPHA(c)              (ISUPPER (c) || ISLOWER (c))

00486 #define TOUPPER(c)              (ISLOWER (c) ? (c) - 'a' + 'A' : (c))

00492 #define TOLOWER(c)              (ISUPPER (c) ? (c) - 'A' + 'a' : (c))

00502 struct tm {
00503         int    tm_sec;   /* seconds [0,61] */
00504         int    tm_min;   /* minutes [0,59] */
00505         int    tm_hour;  /* hour [0,23] */
00506         int    tm_mday;  /* day of month [1,31] */
00507         int    tm_mon;   /* month of year [0,11] */
00508         int    tm_year;  /* years since 1900 */
00509         int    tm_wday;  /* day of week [0,6] (Sunday = 0) */
00510         int    tm_yday;  /* day of year [0,365] */
00511         int    tm_isdst; /* daylight savings flag */
00512 };
